title: How to Download Tekkit

steps.headline: Go to https://www.technicpack.net in a Web browser.
steps.description: To update your Java software, go to https://java.com/en/download in a Web browser and click Free Java Download.

steps.headline: Click Download at the top of the page.
steps.description: You may see a few "clickbait" ads disguised as download buttons on the page.

steps.headline: Scroll down and click on your OS.
steps.description:
The options are:
Windows
Mac OS
Linux

steps.headline: Select a location and click Save.
Double-click the Technic Launcher installation file to begin the installation.
Click on Modpacks at the top of the window.
Enter your Technic Platform user name and password in the lower-left of the window.
Click Launch in the lower-left.
steps.description: The Tekkit modpack has been installed. Your clients must also have Technic Launcher in order to join your server.

text:
Go to https://www.technicpack.net in a Web browser. To update your Java software, go to https://java.com/en/download in a Web browser and click Free Java Download. Click Download at the top of the page. You may see a few "clickbait" ads disguised as download buttons on the page. Scroll down and click on your OS. The options are:
Windows
Mac OS
Linux Select a location and click Save.  Double-click the Technic Launcher installation file to begin the installation.  Click on Modpacks at the top of the window.  Click on Tekkit  Enter your Technic Platform user name and password in the lower-left of the window.  Click Launch in the lower-left. The Tekkit modpack has been installed. Your clients must also have Technic Launcher in order to join your server.
sentences: Go to https://www.technicpack.net in a Web browser.
To update your Java software, go to https://java.com/en/download in a Web browser and click Free Java Download.
Click Download at the top of the page.
You may see a few "clickbait" ads disguised as download buttons on the page.
Scroll down and click on your OS.

The options are:
Windows
Mac OS
Linux Select a location and click Save.
Double-click the Technic Launcher installation file to begin the installation.
Click on Modpacks at the top of the window.
Click on Tekkit  Enter your Technic Platform user name and password in the lower-left of the window.
The Tekkit modpack has been installed.
Your clients must also have Technic Launcher in order to join your server.
tyn_section: Around 1GB of RAM. Tekkit may run on less, but will likely be quite slow.
